about_the_game:
Backstory:
You are having a feverish dream about being stuck in the woods at night and there are zombois coming at you from multiple directions...WAIT WHAT ?!?... just when you thought you are about to wake up, you realize, that you are actually stuck in the woods at night and there are zombois coming at you !?!
Luckily you got your semi-auto assault buckshot dispenser at the ready... So better start dispensing!

Features:
- arena style map
- zombie survival shooter type game
- randomized enemy spawns
- dark and moody lighting
- semi-auto assault buckshot dispenser
- 15 minute timer to beat
- new phase every 5 minutes

Hints:
- stay alert
- listen carefully for enemy noise (Headphones recommended)
- dispense those buckshot pellets in a controlled manner
- watch your ammo
- if you get caught, you lose
detailed_description:
Backstory:
You are having a feverish dream about being stuck in the woods at night and there are zombois coming at you from multiple directions...WAIT WHAT ?!?... just when you thought you are about to wake up, you realize, that you are actually stuck in the woods at night and there are zombois coming at you !?!
Luckily you got your semi-auto assault buckshot dispenser at the ready... So better start dispensing!

Features:
- arena style map
- zombie survival shooter type game
- randomized enemy spawns
- dark and moody lighting
- semi-auto assault buckshot dispenser
- 15 minute timer to beat
- new phase every 5 minutes

Hints:
- stay alert
- listen carefully for enemy noise (Headphones recommended)
- dispense those buckshot pellets in a controlled manner
- watch your ammo
- if you get caught, you lose

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS / X11
  • Graphics: modern graphics card (Vulkan support required)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS / X11
  • Processor: i5 5000 series or equivalent
  • Graphics: RX 480 or equivalent (Vulkan support required)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: leave VSYNC on, to keep the frame rate in check (on by default)

name: OCH NOE -thegame-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: modern graphics card (Vulkan support required)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 5000 series or equivalent
  • Graphics: RX 480 or equivalent (Vulkan support required)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: leave VSYNC on, to keep the frame rate in check (on by default)

short_description: OCH NOE -thegame- is a zombie survival shooter type game, but is also meant to be kinda funny. As the player you must try to stay alive for 15 minutes.
